title: Set up project structure and development environment
description:
Initialize React/Next.js project with TypeScript, configure ESLint, Prettier, and Tailwind CSS. Set up project folder structure (components, pages, styles, utils, assets). Configure git repository with proper .gitignore. Install core dependencies: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, React Icons.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Project initialized with Next.js 14+ and TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS properly configured with company color palette
- ESLint and Prettier configured with company standards
- Folder structure created: components/, pages/, styles/, utils/, assets/
- Git repository initialized with proper .gitignore
- All core dependencies installed and working
review_by_product_manager: Break down this task to smaller tasks

title: Create responsive layout components
description:
Build reusable layout components: Header, Footer, Navigation, Sidebar (if needed). Header should include logo, navigation menu, and CTA button. Footer should include company info, quick links, social media icons, and copyright. Navigation should be responsive with hamburger menu for mobile.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Header component with responsive navigation
- Footer component with all required sections
- Mobile hamburger menu functionality
- Proper spacing and typography
- Company logo integration
- Social media icons integration
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Layout components are essential for all pages

title: Build hero section with value proposition
description:
Create hero section with: 1) Main headline highlighting AI automation services, 2) Subheadline explaining benefits, 3) Primary CTA button (Get Started/Contact Us), 4) Secondary CTA button (Learn More), 5) Background image/gradient with company colors, 6) Responsive design for all screen sizes.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Hero section takes full viewport height on desktop
- Clear value proposition with company tagline
- Visually appealing design with proper contrast
- Responsive layout for mobile, tablet, desktop
- Smooth hover effects on buttons
- Proper loading of background elements
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Hero section is the first impression

title: Create services showcase section
description:
Build services section displaying AI automation services: 1) Service cards with icons, 2) Service titles and descriptions, 3) Hover effects on cards, 4) Grid layout (3 columns on desktop, 2 on tablet, 1 on mobile), 5) Section heading and subheading explaining services.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Minimum 4 service cards with proper spacing
- Consistent card design with company branding
- Smooth hover animations
- Responsive grid layout
- Clear section hierarchy
- Proper icon integration
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Services showcase is core content

title: Build client testimonials section
description:
Create testimonials section with: 1) Client quotes with names and companies, 2) Star ratings, 3) Client logos/avatars, 4) Carousel/slider functionality for multiple testimonials, 5) Section heading explaining social proof.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Minimum 3 testimonials displayed
- Carousel with navigation arrows and dots
- Responsive design for all screen sizes
- Proper typography for quotes
- Smooth transition animations
- Accessible carousel controls

title: Create call-to-action section
description:
Build final CTA section with: 1) Compelling headline encouraging action, 2) Clear value proposition, 3) Primary CTA button (Schedule Consultation), 4) Secondary option (View Case Studies), 5) Background with company colors, 6) Responsive spacing.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Visually distinct section with proper contrast
- Clear, action-oriented copy
- Proper button hierarchy
- Responsive design
- Smooth scroll to contact form
- Mobile-optimized layout

title: Build services overview page
description:
Create dedicated services page with: 1) Hero section specific to services, 2) Detailed service descriptions with benefits, 3) Process/workflow visualization, 4) Service comparison table, 5) FAQ section for common service questions, 6) CTA section for service inquiries.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Comprehensive service descriptions
- Visual process flow diagram
- Responsive comparison table
- Expandable FAQ accordion
- Clear navigation to individual service pages
- Mobile-optimized layout
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Services page is key conversion page

title: Create individual service detail pages
description:
Build template for individual service pages: 1) Service-specific hero, 2) Detailed problem-solution explanation, 3) Technical implementation details, 4) Case studies/examples, 5) Pricing information (if applicable), 6) Contact form for service inquiries.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Consistent template across all service pages
- Detailed technical information
- Visual examples/case studies
- Clear pricing structure (if applicable)
- Service-specific contact form
- Related services navigation
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Individual pages provide detailed information

title: Build company story and mission page
description:
Create about page with: 1) Company history and founding story, 2) Mission, vision, and values sections, 3) Team member profiles with photos and roles, 4) Company culture highlights, 5) Milestones and achievements timeline, 6) Office photos/virtual tour.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Compelling company narrative
- Clear presentation of core values
- Responsive team member grid
- Interactive timeline component
- High-quality images with proper optimization
- Mobile-friendly layout
review_by_product_manager: Approved - About page builds trust and credibility

title: Create portfolio/case studies page
description:
Build case studies page with: 1) Filterable grid of case studies, 2) Individual case study cards with preview images, 3) Filter by industry/service type, 4) Search functionality, 5) Detailed case study view modal/page, 6) Results/metrics visualization.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Filterable grid with smooth animations
- Case study cards with consistent design
- Functional search and filter system
- Detailed view with before/after metrics
- Client logos and testimonials integration
- Responsive image gallery

title: Build contact form and information page
description:
Create contact page with: 1) Contact form with validation (name, email, message, service interest), 2) Company contact information (address, phone, email), 3) Interactive map (Google Maps/Leaflet), 4) Office hours display, 5) Social media links, 6) Form submission confirmation.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Fully functional contact form with validation
- Interactive map with company location
- Responsive form layout
- Form submission handling with success/error states
- Accessible form fields with proper labels
- Mobile-optimized contact information display
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Contact page is primary conversion point

title: Create blog listing and article pages
description:
Build blog section with: 1) Blog listing page with article cards, 2) Category filtering, 3) Search functionality, 4) Individual article pages with proper formatting, 5) Related articles section, 6) Author information and publish dates.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Responsive blog grid layout
- Functional category filtering
- Search with real-time results
- Article pages with proper typography and images
- Social sharing buttons
- Comment system integration (optional)

title: Create reusable UI component library
description:
Build shared UI components: 1) Buttons (primary, secondary, outline, disabled states), 2) Cards (service, team, blog), 3) Forms (input fields, textareas, selects), 4) Modals/dialogs, 5) Accordions/expandable sections, 6) Loading spinners and skeletons.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Consistent component design system
- Proper TypeScript interfaces
- Comprehensive Storybook documentation
- Responsive behavior for all components
- Accessibility compliance (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)
- Theme support for light/dark mode

title: Implement mobile-first responsive design
description:
Ensure all pages and components are fully responsive: 1) Mobile breakpoints (320px, 375px, 425px), 2) Tablet breakpoints (768px), 3) Desktop breakpoints (1024px, 1280px, 1440px), 4) Touch-friendly interface elements, 5) Responsive images with srcset, 6) Performance optimization for mobile.

Acceptance Criteria:
- All pages tested on mobile, tablet, desktop
- Touch targets minimum 44x44px
- Responsive images with proper loading
- No horizontal scrolling on mobile
- Proper font scaling
- Performance score >90 on Lighthouse mobile audit

title: Optimize website performance and loading
description:
Implement performance optimizations: 1) Image optimization with next/image, 2) Code splitting and lazy loading, 3) Font optimization and subsetting, 4) CSS minification and purging, 5) Bundle size analysis and optimization, 6) Caching strategies implementation.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Lighthouse performance score >95
- First Contentful Paint <1.5s
- Largest Contentful Paint <2.5s
- Cumulative Layout Shift <0.1
- Total blocking time <200ms
- Bundle size optimized with tree shaking
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Performance impacts user experience and SEO

title: Implement SEO and accessibility features
description:
Add SEO and accessibility: 1) Meta tags and structured data, 2) Semantic HTML structure, 3) ARIA labels and roles, 4) Keyboard navigation support, 5) Screen reader compatibility, 6) Open Graph and Twitter cards.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Proper semantic HTML tags throughout
- Complete meta tags for all pages
- Structured data (JSON-LD) for organization
- WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
- Keyboard navigation for all interactive elements
- Alt text for all images
review_by_product_manager: Approved - SEO and accessibility are mandatory

title: Implement comprehensive testing suite
description:
Create testing infrastructure: 1) Unit tests for components, 2) Integration tests for pages, 3) End-to-end tests for critical user flows, 4) Accessibility testing with axe-core, 5) Visual regression testing, 6) Performance testing automation.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Test coverage >80% for critical components
- E2E tests for: homepage navigation, contact form, service inquiry
- Accessibility tests passing for all pages
- Visual regression tests for key components
- CI/CD integration for automated testing
- Performance tests in CI pipeline
review_by_product_manager: Approved - Testing ensures quality and prevents regressions

title: Set up deployment and hosting configuration
description:
Configure deployment: 1) Vercel/Netlify deployment setup, 2) Environment variables configuration, 3) Custom domain setup, 4) SSL certificate configuration, 5) CDN configuration, 6) Monitoring and analytics setup.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Automated deployment from main branch
- Custom domain (completeautomate.com) configured
- SSL certificate active and valid
- CDN serving static assets
- Google Analytics/GTM integration
- Error monitoring (Sentry/LogRocket) setup
